Position: Distribution & Key Accounts Manager – Consumer Solutions MEA

Distrib CANDIDATE 		Karim El-Zayat
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		UAE – Dubai
QUALIFICATIONS
MBA: École Supérieure Libre des Sciences Commerciales Appliquées (ESLSCA) – Cairo Branch. 2014
Major: Management Section - GPA: 3.9

Major: Chemical Engineering Department
Grade: Fair (64.11%)
Graduation Project: (Recycling Of Polyurethane) - Graduation Project Grade: Excellent
Languages
Arabic: Mother Tongue
English: Excellent
French: Fair (Level 3)
German: High School Level
CAREER SUMMARY
May 2010 to date Dow Chemical GmbH IMEA
March 2021 to date
Position: Distribution & Key Accounts Manager – Consumer Solutions MEA
Added Key Account Management responsibilities for all Dow's key accounts in Home & Personal Care across the MEA region.
Distribution management responsibilities for all the Dow Consumer Solutions channel partners across the MEA region.
Responsible for the distributors hiring, termination, counselling, timely evaluation, short and long term strategy build up.
Managing distributors across the different businesses of the Dow Consumer Solutions platform – within Home Care, Personal Care, Food, Construction, Mobility, Transportation, Electronics & Industrial Chemical applications.
Internal focal point and liaison between the Sales, Marketing, Technical and Public affairs functional teams responsible for the key accounts & all channel partners within the Dow Consumer Solutions platform.
Jan 2020 to Mar 2021
Position: Regional Commercial & Unilever Key Account Manager – MEA
Added Key Account Management responsibilities for Dow's global account - Unilever.
Acting as the Relationship Focal Point between Dow and Unilever for the Home & Personal Care business.
Implementing the dully agreed upon strategies between Dow and Unilever.
Managing a regional account team of (3) Account Managers on functional basis across the MEA region.
Internal focal point and liaison between the Sales, Marketing, Technical and Public affairs functional teams responsible for the Unilever account within the Dow Home & Personal Care business.
Managing communications and establishing a timeline of performance with the Unilever Procurement teams within the region.
Jan 2017 to Jan 2020
Position: Business Development Manager – MEA
Responsible for developing the Silicones newly acquired business by Dow in the MEA market.
Focusing developments on the Home & Personal Care, Construction and Industrial markets.
Working on a staged approach including creating the market assessment, short and mid-term strategies and means of strategies implementation.
Defining and confirming the route to market in the focus countries for the different sub-segments.
Leading a team of (4) Account Managers and working closely with the corporate marketing and business development teams.
Jan 2012 to Jan 2017
Position: Regional Commercial Manager, Consumer Care Platform MEA
Commercial Management for 2 businesses within the Dow Chemical Company; The Dow Pharmaceutical & Food Solutions Business and the Dow Home & Personal Care Business.
Leading a team of (4) Account Managers and (2) Customer Service Representatives.
Creating and defining objectives for the business team in MEA.
Responsible for the retention, promotion and succession planning for the two businesses.
Responsibility over (10) distributors/channel partners and all the direct customers within MEA.
Responsible for the P&L: Setting and achieving the topline and bottom line plans for the MEA region.
Developing the sales plans, annual budgets, short and long term strategic intents for the two businesses within the region.
May 2010 to Jan 2012
Position: Account Manager – North Africa
Responsible for the sales and promotion of the (Dow Home & Personal Care - DHPC), (Dow Wolf Cellulosics - DWC), and (Dow Microbial Control - DMC) departments products in Egypt & North Africa.
Managing (9) distributors and all the direct customers throughout the North African region.
Keeping Strategic Relations With Senior Key Clients in the region
Reporting to the DHPC Regional Commercial Manager (Cairo) & the DMC Regional Commercial Manager (Dubai).
Developing the sales plans, price lists and tar

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
